result.eng: They pulled down the tallest building.
result.ga: Leag siad an foirgneamh is airde
result.orig: Leag siad an foirgneamh is airde
result.html: Leag siad an foirgneamh is airdeThey pulled down the tallest building.
result.ponchtml: Leag siad an foirgneaṁ is airdeThey pulled down the tallest building.

result.ga: Beidh mé ó dheas i gCorcaigh
result.orig: Beidh mé ó dheas i gCorcaigh
result.html: Beidh mé ó dheas i gCorcaighI'll be down in Cork.
result.ponchtml: Beiḋ mé ó ḋeas i gCorcaiġI'll be down in Cork.

result.eng: The politicians must cut down on their expenses.
result.ga: Caithfidh na polaiteoirí gearradh siar ar a gcuid costas
result.orig: Caithfidh na polaiteoirí gearradh siar ar a gcuid costas
result.html: Caithfidh na polaiteoirí gearradh siar ar a gcuid costasThe politicians must cut down on their expenses.
result.ponchtml: Caiṫfiḋ na polaiteoirí gearraḋ siar ar a gcuid costasThe politicians must cut down on their expenses.

result.eng: Sit down in this comfortable chair.
result.ga: Suigh síos sa chathaoir chompordach seo
result.orig: Suigh síos sa chathaoir chompordach seo
result.html: Suigh síos sa chathaoir chompordach seoSit down in this comfortable chair.
result.ponchtml: Suiġ síos sa ċaṫaoir ċompordaċ seoSit down in this comfortable chair.

result.ga: Chrom mé ar an obair
result.orig: Chrom mé ar an obair
result.html: Chrom mé ar an obairI got down to work.
result.ponchtml: Ċrom mé ar an obairI got down to work.

result.eng: Put it down on the floor.
result.ga: Cuir síos ar an urlár é
result.orig: Cuir síos ar an urlár é
result.html: Cuir síos ar an urlár éPut it down on the floor.
result.ponchtml: Cuir síos ar an urlár éPut it down on the floor.

result.eng: I hadn't had any proper time to get down to it until now.
result.ga: Ní raibh am ceart agam le tabhairt faoi go dtí seo
result.orig: Ní raibh am ceart agam le tabhairt faoi go dtí seo
result.html: Ní raibh am ceart agam le tabhairt faoi go dtí seoI hadn't had any proper time to get down to it until now.
result.ponchtml: Ní raiḃ am ceart agam le taḃairt faoi go dtí seoI hadn't had any proper time to get down to it until now.

result.ga: Suigh síos le do thoil
result.orig: Suigh síos le do thoil
result.html: Suigh síos le do thoilSit down please.
result.ponchtml: Suiġ síos le do ṫoilSit down please.

result.eng: I gave him permission to sit down.
result.ga: Thug mé cead dó suí síos
result.orig: Thug mé cead dó suí síos
result.html: Thug mé cead dó suí síosI gave him permission to sit down.
result.ponchtml: Ṫug mé cead dó suí síosI gave him permission to sit down.

result.eng: I got down to writing the essay and I had it finished in two hours.
result.ga: Thug mé faoin aiste agus bhí sí críochnaithe agam i gceann dhá uair an chloig
result.orig: Thug mé faoin aiste agus bhí sí críochnaithe agam i gceann dhá uair an chloig
result.html: Thug mé faoin aiste agus bhí sí críochnaithe agam i gceann dhá uair an chloigI got down to writing the essay and I had it finished in two hours.
result.ponchtml: Ṫug mé faoin aiste agus ḃí sí críoċnaiṫe agam i gceann ḋá uair an ċloigI got down to writing the essay and I had it finished in two hours.

result.eng: He's coming down from the stage.
result.ga: Tá sé ag teacht anuas ón stáitse
result.orig: Tá sé ag teacht anuas ón stáitse
result.html: Tá sé ag teacht anuas ón stáitseHe's coming down from the stage.
result.ponchtml: Tá sé ag teaċt anuas ón stáitseHe's coming down from the stage.

result.ga: Téigh síos an tsráid
result.orig: Téigh síos an tsráid
result.html: Téigh síos an tsráidGo down the street.
result.ponchtml: Téiġ síos an tsráidGo down the street.

result.ga: Téigh síos san íoslach
result.orig: Téigh síos san íoslach
result.html: Téigh síos san íoslachGo down to the basement.
result.ponchtml: Téiġ síos san íoslaċGo down to the basement.

result.ga: Suigh síos ansin
result.orig: Suigh síos ansin
result.html: Suigh síos ansinSit down over there.
result.ponchtml: Suiġ síos ansinSit down over there.

result.ga: Suigh síos
result.orig: Suigh síos
result.html: Suigh síosSit down.
result.ponchtml: Suiġ síosSit down.

result.eng: Go down that road and you will see the bus stop there on Merchants Road.
result.ga: Téigí síos an bóthar sin agus feicfidh sibh stad na mbusanna ansin ar Shráid na gCeannaithe
result.orig: Téigí síos an bóthar sin agus feicfidh sibh stad na mbusanna ansin ar Shráid na gCeannaithe
result.html: Téigí síos an bóthar sin agus feicfidh sibh stad na mbusanna ansin ar Shráid na gCeannaitheGo down that road and you will see the bus stop there on Merchants Road.
result.ponchtml: Téigí síos an bóṫar sin agus feicfiḋ siḃ stad na mbusanna ansin ar Ṡráid na gCeannaiṫeGo down that road and you will see the bus stop there on Merchants Road.

result.eng: Sit down here and pull up your sleeve.
result.ga: Suigh síos anseo agus crap suas do mhuinchille
result.orig: Suigh síos anseo agus crap suas do mhuinchille
result.html: Suigh síos anseo agus crap suas do mhuinchilleSit down here and pull up your sleeve.
result.ponchtml: Suiġ síos anseo agus crap suas do ṁuinċilleSit down here and pull up your sleeve.

result.ga: Ná bí á shlogadh
result.orig: Ná bí á shlogadh
result.html: Ná bí á shlogadhDon't gulp it down!
result.ponchtml: Ná bí á ẛlogaḋDon't gulp it down!

result.ga: Suígí síos
result.orig: Suígí síos
result.html: Suígí síosSit down.
result.ponchtml: Suígí síosSit down.

result.ga: Suígí síos tamaillín
result.orig: Suígí síos tamaillín
result.html: Suígí síos tamaillínSit down for a while.
result.ponchtml: Suígí síos tamaillínSit down for a while.

result.ga: Cuir síos d'uilleannacha
result.orig: Cuir síos d'uilleannacha
result.html: Cuir síos d'uilleannachaPut your elbows down.
result.ponchtml: Cuir síos d'uilleannaċaPut your elbows down.

result.ga: Cuirigí bhur n-uilleannacha síos
result.orig: Cuirigí bhur n-uilleannacha síos
result.html: Cuirigí bhur n-uilleannacha síosPut your elbows down.
result.ponchtml: Cuirigí ḃur n-uilleannaċa síosPut your elbows down.

result.eng: You had to crouch down to get in there.
result.ga: Bhí ort dul síos ar do chromada chun dul isteach ann
result.orig: Bhí ort dul síos ar do chromada chun dul isteach ann
result.html: Bhí ort dul síos ar do chromada chun dul isteach annYou had to crouch down to get in there.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí ort dul síos ar do ċromada ċun dul isteaċ annYou had to crouch down to get in there.

result.ga: Gabh ar d'aghaidh Bí i do shuí
result.orig: Gabh ar d'aghaidh Bí i do shuí
result.html: Gabh ar d'aghaidh Bí i do shuíCome on in. Sit down.
result.ponchtml: Gaḃ ar d'aġaiḋ Bí i do ẛuíCome on in. Sit down.

result.eng: He put them upside down in the middle of the floor.
result.ga: Bhuail sé a mbéal fúthu i lár an urláir iad
result.orig: Bhuail sé a mbéal fúthu i lár an urláir iad
result.html: Bhuail sé a mbéal fúthu i lár an urláir iadHe put them upside down in the middle of the floor.
